content: That's a great point about insurance. I'll definitely look into it. By the way, speaking of jewelry, I recently bought a new pair of earrings from a local boutique on Main Street. They're a beautiful pair of dangling silver hoops with small crystals, and I've worn them three times already. I'm thinking of getting a gold chain belt to match, which I saw on Amazon. Have you heard anything about that trend? Is it still popular?
